title: Creating a Serious League Team
body:
Hey Everyone Me and my mate want to get in a more serious league of legends and to do that we need 3 other members.
We are both currently Platinum 5 (Jungler and Support/top laner Main) so currently we are looking for a Top,Mid,ADC and Maybe a Top laner and support. (we are also Looking for somone that can take a Shotcaller Role)

Abit about us:
We were both really competitive CS:GO players who were in many CS:GO tournaments and we want to take that enjoyment of winning with a team into League of Legends

If Interested Please Leave a Comment Below using this Format:
IGN:
Rank:
Roles:
Age:
3 Best Champions:
Do you Follow the Meta (yes/no):
Normal Play Time:
Time Zone/State:
Highly Motivated (yes/no)
Any other Things we need to know about you:

replies.body:
IGN: Aske
Rank: Plat 4
Roles: Adc Top
Age: 20
3 Best Champions: Lucian Vayne Trist
Do you Follow the Meta (yes/no): Yes
Normal Play Time: During the day unless work
Time Zone/State: Perth
Highly Motivated (yes/no): Trying to get motivation back
Any other Things we need to know about you: trying to start getting good again hopefully team environment can do so

IGN: ThatGuyIsMiitch
Rank: Silver 3
Roles: ADC
Age: 19
3 Best Champions: Kalista, Sivir, Lucian
Do you Follow the Meta (yes/no): Yes i do follow the meta.
Normal Play Time: Whenever i can
Time Zone/State: Aest, Victoria
Highly Motivated (yes/no) I am very highly motivated
Any other Things we need to know about you: I really wanna go into the competitive scene of League but obvs my rank restricts me of that but i believe i am better than what my rank shows, and i dont want to blame my team mates but alot of it has to do with trolls and leavers. I believe i am a great shot caller for my rank and i really think i could help your team aswell as play my roll :)

Cheers Mitch

PS. Please consider me, because if i got the chance i know i wouldnt disappoint you guys

ing TSM YeIlow Star
rank plat 5
roles support main mid secondary
age 19
3 best champs janna alistar bard/taric
normal play time afternoons at like 4pm and till like 2am 
state NSW
motivated sure am
i play all supports im not the best at some like thresh and leona due to them not being in meta but im sure i can fit the role with my champ pool

Hey,
So I'm only in silver, but I am a very dedicated player. Obviously I'm not as skilled as you too are but I am looking to improve. It would be wonderful if you could help me improve so I can become higher elo to join your team. If not I completely understand as I am only in silver right now. Regardless, have a nice day ^ - ^

I hate to be that guy, but the title should read "Creating a Serious League Team"
if you want to look serious, that is
thanks i guess :) should of checked my grammar
